data.decision: Decision Closure System: Use Option B - enhance existing duro_validate_decision with append-only history rather than creating new decision_review artifact type. Build duro_list_unreviewed_decisions as surfacing mechanism. Add review_due_date only to architectural/strategic decisions.
data.rationale: Phase 1 proves the habit works; Phase 2 earns complexity. New artifact types create bureaucracy. Existing primitives (validate_decision, evaluations) give 80% of value. Surfacing mechanism is the real win - can't review what you can't see.
alternatives: Option A: Full decision_review artifact type with separate storage
Option C: No system change, just manual review habit
